New Records: Mayank Yadav made a promising debut
Arshdeep Singh was the PLAYER OF THE MATCH for his brilliant bowling spell
Key Match Events: India bundled out Bangladesh for a below-par 127
India chased down the target in 11.5 overs
Hardik Pandya and Nitish Kumar Reddy joined hands to finish the job
Mehidy Hasan struck in his very first over and India were 3 down now
Pre-Game Insights: No specific pre-game insights were mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav said they just tried to back their skills and tried to walk the talk
Najmul Hossain Shanto said that they did not start well and need to focus on strike rotation and not only on hitting boundaries
Varun Chakaravarthy said it feels like a rebirth for him to be back in the blues
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first T20I in this new stadium in Gwalior was dominated by India
The 2nd T20I will be played on 9th October, Wednesday in New Delhi at the iconic Arun Jaitley Stadium
